name: Forge Industry
description:
Embark on a journey of blacksmithing greatness in Forge Industry, where you play as the master of a growing settlement, tasked with crafting the finest weapons, armor, and other items.

Starting from scratch, you'll discover the thrill of transporting raw materials, creating your own road grid, smelting metals, and forging your first simple weapons. As you build up your resources, you'll unlock the opportunity to delve into the mysteries of exotic materials and restore your harbor, opening up trade routes with the rest of the world.

Take on exciting challenges outside of your settlement, accepting weapon orders from powerful factions and gaining knowledge of new weapons and materials in return. With each new creation, you inch closer to your ultimate goal - to craft the most precious ring and ask the love of your life to be your wife.

Get ready to build your legacy in Forge Industry.




Unleash your inner master builder with deep manufacturing, crafting, and research mechanics in Forge Industry! With every playthrough, you'll have the opportunity to optimize, refine, and perfect your strategy, ensuring endless hours of gameplay.
Whether you're experimenting with new techniques or fine-tuning your existing methods, you'll never run out of ways to improve and innovate!


Step into a world of endless possibilities!
With 4 distinct environments (Plains, Desert, Snowy Peaks, Islands) and randomly generated worlds, each playthrough offers a fresh and exciting challenge. Whether you're exploring new territories or facing unexpected obstacles, there's always a new world waiting to test your skills and keep you on your toes.


Ready to take your Forge Industry experience to the next level? The base game is just the beginning! With a modding philosophy designed to make community extensions a breeze, you'll be able to unleash your imagination and bring your wildest ideas to life. Want to add tanks, rockets, and completely new mechanics to the game? The sky's the limit in Forge Industry, where the only limit is your creativity.

And much more...

Experience the thrill of blacksmithing mastery in Forge Industry, featuring:
  • Cutting-edge automation options that empower you to optimize your empire and run your operation like a well-oiled machine.
  • Dynamic events that put you in the driver's seat and allow you to shape the world around you - pick sides, sway markets, discover secrets, and have a blast!
  • A rich and immersive learning experience that delves into the art of blacksmithing, historical weapons, and the real-life processes behind crafting these items.

    ...and much, much more!

    Follow the development

    Get an inside look at the game's development journey by tuning into our monthly devlogs and behind the scenes content, exclusively available on our YouTube Channel.
